about_the_game:
This is a demo version.

This is a strategy tower defense game full of variety.

Miryam attacks monsters coming from all directions by building defense turrets in various shapes.

The turrets have rich functions, such as bonfire piles that can set the ground on fire, fireflies that can illuminate monsters, grumpy pottery geese, etc. By building different types, quantities, and positions of turrets, you can form your own unique formation style.

There is a wide variety of enemies. In this trial version, land and air monsters with different behaviors are presented, and each level is a brand - new challenge.
detailed_description:

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel i5 4690 / AMD FX 8350
  • Graphics: 2 GB

short_description: Traverse the wasteland with Miryam. Use magic items to build defenses against evil spirits. It's a casual tower defense game of construction and resource balance. Characters grow via challenges, from timid to fearless and wild. The blend of building and defense makes it addictive and engaging
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
